name: Emberfall Guildhall
description: You are now ready to take on a new adventure. Whether you chat, relax, or take on a quest it's all up to you.

start.title: Emberfall Guildhall
start.description: You push open the heavy doors and step into the guildhall. Warm lamplight spills across worn wooden tables, a low hum of conversation fills the air, and a notice board stands by the far wall. The clerk at the counter looks up and nods. You can relax for a while, speak with the clerk, eavesdrop on the gossips, or examine the quest board.

relax_scene.title: A Moment's Rest
relax_scene.description: You find an empty bench by a glowing brazier. The scent of stew and spiced ale drifts by. For the first time in a while you can breathe. You watch a pair of seasoned adventurers compare maps and a bard tune his lute.

choices.label: Stretch your legs and loosen up.
Get up and explore the hall.

friendly_chat_scene.title: Friendly Exchange
friendly_chat_scene.description: You exchange small talk with a nearby adventurer. They share a tidbit about a local spot and give you a quick tip on dealing with low-level bandits.

choices.label: Thank them and return to resting.
Ask for more details about the spot.

clerk_scene.title: At the Clerk's Counter
clerk_scene.description: The clerk glances at you with a familiar nod. 'Good to see a guild member. How can I help?' they ask. Behind them are shelves of parchment and an ink-stained ledger. You can ask about available services or local rumors.

choices.label: Ask if they've heard anything interesting.

services_info.title: Guild Services
services_info.description: The clerk lists services: message relay, training partners, a modest library of field notes, and secure storage for valuables. Many adventurers make use of the training grounds behind the hall.

clerk_rumors.title: Quiet Rumors
clerk_rumors.description: The clerk leans in and whispers: 'There've been strange lights near the old mill, and a caravan lost horses not far from the crossroads.' The information might be useful to someone seeking work.'

choices.label: Make a mental note of the rumors.

gossip_scene.title: Heard and Unheard
gossip_scene.description: A cluster of patrons trade stories at a nearby table. You catch fragments: a missing merchant's ledger, a celebrated hunt, and a bar fight that ended with a coin gone missing. Voices drop when they notice you listening.

choices.label: Stay and eavesdrop a little longer.

join_gossip.title: Joining In
join_gossip.description: You share a joke and are welcomed. An old hunter mentions a hidden copse where strange tracks were found. It's small talk, but these leads sometimes lead to coin.

choices.label: Ask for details about the copse.

gossip_listen_more.title: Bits of Truth
gossip_listen_more.description: You pick up a few useful details: a color described as 'ashen', a time 'two nights ago', and a place 'west of the crossroads'. These scraps might be worth noting.

board_scene.title: The Quest Board
board_scene.description: Pinned to the board are several notices: a request for escorting merchants, a call to clear a small den of vermin, and a hand-drawn map with a location marked 'old mill'. Rewards are modest, but honest work keeps the lights on.

choices.label: Study the map to the old mill.

escort_offer.title: Escort Request
escort_offer.description: A merchant seeks a safe escort to the next town. 'Nothing dangerous, just keeping bandits at bay,' the notice reads. Reward: modest coin, possible favor.

vermin_offer.title: Vermin Clearing
vermin_offer.description: A notice requests help clearing a rat-filled cellar under the bakery. 'Bring a lantern, and a steady hand,' it warns. Reward: small purse of coin.

choices.label: Take the job to clear vermin.

old_mill_offer.title: Marked on the Map
old_mill_offer.description: Someone has drawn a crude map with 'old mill' circled. The note below reads: 'Strange lights, coin offered for answers.' It looks like a proper mystery for the curious.

choices.label: Take note and prepare to investigate.

accept_job.title: Job Accepted
accept_job.description: You pin the job to your satchel. Preparation will be needed, but this is how livelihoods are built. Return to the clerk if you need supplies or information.

choices.label: Head out to begin the task.
